gui.form.base

Class InputBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.form.base.FormObject
      • gui.form.base.InputBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChangeSubject, AsciiTypable, FunctionTypable, Typable, java.lang.Comparable<FormObject>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RegexCheckedInputBox

    public abstract class InputBox
extends FormObject
implements Typable
    InputBox that can be added to a Form.
